com.gtomato.android.ui.transformer

Class CoverFlowViewTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gtomato.android.ui.transformer.ParameterizableViewTransformer
      • com.gtomato.android.ui.transformer.CoverFlowViewTransformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CarouselView.ViewTransformer

    public class CoverFlowViewTransformer
extends ParameterizableViewTransformer

    Simulates effect of cover flow.

    Available parameters:
    • setOffsetXPercent(float) linear X-axis translation rate. Default 0.8
    • setScaleYFactor(float) linear Y-axis scale rate. Default -0.2
    • setYProjection(double) Y-axis rotation degree when position = 2. Default 60

      • transform

        public void transform(android.view.View view,
                      float position)
        Description copied from interface: CarouselView.ViewTransformer
        Transform a given item view based on position. Usually translate, rotation, alpha, visibility, ... may be altered.
        Specified by:
        transform in interface CarouselView.ViewTransformer
        Overrides:
        transform in class ParameterizableViewTransformer
        Parameters:
        view - Item view
        position - For example, 0 for the current center-most item at a stable position; 4 for 4-th item at the right to the current item; -3 for 3-rd item at the left to the current item; 0.1 for the current item with 10% offset right to its stable position.
